title: Instructional Design Workshop for Developing Medical School Online Education Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Delphi study and survey methodology workshop for developing online medical education content evaluation tools. Participants analyze actual PGMeL (Postgraduate Medical E-Learning) module cases and engage in validating the evaluation tool’s validity

learning_goals: Cultivating the ability to design online medical education evaluation tools based on the AMEE 7-step process.
Conducting validity verification of educational materials using Delphi studies and survey methods.
Developing and interpreting evaluation surveys to analyze the educational effectiveness of PGMeL modules.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
